H0.text: What is the biggest Italian automaker. Lamborghini

H1.text: What is the biggest Italian automaker. Alfa Romeo

H2.text: What is the biggest Italian automaker. Maserati

H3.text: What is the biggest Italian automaker. FIAT

A4.text: Fiat Automobiles is the largest automobile manufacturer in Italy.

A5.text: In 1970, Fiat Automobiles employed more than 100,000 in Italy when its production reached the highest number, 1.4 million cars, in that country.
